author: Special Correspondent
text:
The police have registered one more case in connection with the assault of journalists by Desiya Murpokku Dravida Kazhagam (DMDK) functionaries, including party MLA Parthasarathy.

According to police, a few members of various journalists’ unions were holding a protest a little distance away from DMDK chief Vijayakanth’s house on Thursday in connection with the incident in which he ‘spat’ on journalists.

At this juncture, the DMDK functionaries, including Mr. Parthasarathy, attacked them. Based on a complaint of journalist Varahi, the police arrested 19 persons, including Mr. Parthasarathy.

Anbalagan, another journalist, too had lodged a complaint, based on which the police has filed a case.
title: Assault on journalists: another case registered
